name: Gallelli
bio: Gallelli is an up-and-coming house producer and DJ hailing from the vibrant music scene of the Bay Area, California. With a relentless passion for crafting house music and a magnetic stage presence, Gallelli has been making waves in the electronic music world. He has released four standout records with labels such as LFTD in Canada and the electrifying G House Mafia in Brazil. His signature sound fuses deep, groovy basslines with soulful melodies, captivating listeners and setting dance floors ablaze worldwide. Gallelli's journey continues to ascend as he joins the prestigious ranks of Dirty Not Sorry, a collective known for pushing the boundaries of electronic music. When he's not in the studio crafting infectious tunes, Gallelli takes to the stage, where he truly shines. His dynamic performances have graced some of San Francisco's most iconic venues, including the legendary 1015 Folsom, the sultry Hawthorn, and the intimate yet electric atmosphere of Bergerac. Gallelli's journey into the electronic music scene began with a bang, with his first support show featuring none other than the iconic duo, Dylan and Harry. This early brush with greatness set the stage for his meteoric rise, propelling him into the hearts and minds of dance music enthusiasts across the globe. As an artist, Gallelli's dedication to his craft is unwavering, and his vision for the future of house music is nothing short of exhilarating. With each release and performance, he leaves an indomitable mark on the industry, and his star continues to rise.
